summary: A young Amish woman, who isn't satisfied with her path at home, visits a cousin for the summer. Over the summer, she is exposed to another world, finds friendship and more. Soon she must choose and come to terms with the life she wants.
cast: Trevor Donovan|Danielle C. Ryan|Drew Fuller|Tiffany Dupont|Meg Wittman|Belle Fockler|Nick Petrus|Kaitlyn Sapp|Dawn Lafferty|Kellen Boyle|Rohn Thomas|Cliff Sprang|Brandon Tylka|Charlene Campanella|Rod Fielder|Kevin Fox|Kristie Galloway|Cody Garrett|David Goebel|Joe Kowalski|Mike Kuse|Gabrielle McAndrew|Diana Mishlan|Sue Danna Myer|Caroline Randall|Kristina Randjelovic|Amy Reichert|Brent Reichert|Ian Reichert|Samantha Reichert|Lare Roberts|Jeff Seich|Tim Sposato|Lloyd Weema|Blake Whitt|Thomas W Wolf
title: Paso decisivo
